snippet: Gary Ross, whose adaptation of "The Hunger Games" is the year's highest-grossing movie, said: "As a writer and a director, I simply don't have the time I need to write and prep the movie I would have wanted to make."
abstract: Gary Ross, whose adaptation of "The Hunger Games" is the year's highest-grossing movie, said: "As a writer and a director, I simply don't have the time I need to write and prep the movie I would have wanted to make."

headline.main: 'Hunger Games' Director Won't Return for Sequel
headline.print_headline: Gary Ross, ‘Hunger Games’ Director, Won’t Return for Sequel
